phrases: Scars that just refuse to fade from memory
Sometimes the burdens too much for one to bear
Do Not give up on me, please do not turn me away
Ill hold your hand in mine
Will I lose my hold on her someday?
Will her smile fade in a flood of tears
Or can I keep the fears at bay?
Echoing, distant voices wither into silence.
But there is one thing that will never ever age
My love for you is timeless
Do Not ever say such things to me
All happenings Find meaning in the story
In time the clouds will clear away,
so just stay, please stay with me Whoa!
Who are we to pass through you?
That answer will find you someday
There've been so many incidents like this lately.
It is probably because of them.
It is better you cannot see them.
They will only make you sick.
I am not sure what is happening, but I will not lose!
Does not it look like brother?
Heyisn't there something wrong with this cat?
like I have seen it somewhere before.
Yup, I am not positive, but it is a woman's intuition.
And do you remember where you saw this cat before?
Let us go buy cat food.
No one's going to come to a store like this.
I do not think that is true.
Tell me how many customers we had this month.
Ever since Carrot-top left, they have increased.
I think I am not getting enough exercise lately.
I think I have gained weight.
I have something to take care of that.
I bought this on the Grasshopper Shopping Channel.
It is the original weight-loss remedy, Karugaru-kun.
I mean I just do not believe in such products.
Well, I tried it myself and the results were quite amazing.
For the sake of the town, it is time to exterminate Hollows!
We will get scolded if we do not clean up.
I cannot understand what you are saying!
I think there is something wrong with this cat, after all.
There is nothing wrong with you, right, Raku?
That is what I named it.
Raku as in rakuda or camel, because it is the color of my camel-colored underpants.
What is this car parked in front of our house?
I have a rare day off today,
so I came here incognito to play with him, but
And making such a big scene?
If you are done here, go home.
You are able to see them now, too.
Sorry, but I am going straight to the finish!
Mr. Kanonji, will not you join us for tea?
You two come with me, too!
If I may say so myself
By the way, who are you two?
I am the one who will be clean-up batter in the Majors someday, Jinta.
It seems the Hollows are appearing, lured by its spiritual power.
We should probably let that cat's spirit pass over peacefully.
You are Carrot-top's sisters, and you cannot even figure that out?!
Although you pale in comparison to me,
imagine kids with such talent gathering here!
You will all be my disciples!
I like you more and more, boys and girls.
I have been seeking your type, those with youthful power!
However, that is a little short!
I shall take a good look at your powers!
I do not understand all this,
but it is my chance to show you my true power!
Well, sorry I still have not gotten serious either.
Height has nothing to do with it!
The future is in your hands!
That cat Left like that, it will be attacked again.
No wayand Mr. Kanonji is gone.
If this man, Kisuke, can do something, I will wait.
There is nothing else we can do.
How long is he going to make us wait?
Sorry to keep you waiting, boys and girls.
The charismatic medium of the new century, Don Kanonji,
I will show you what I have got!
Why should heroes fight each other?
Actually, I have been thinking about starting a special troop
with kind-hearted kids who share my vision
to protect the peace of the town!
And they would be called Karakura Super Heroes!
These days in the entertainment world, it is natural for grade school kids
who have undergone rigid auditions to take active parts.
Will you form a unit under me
And on top of that, since you are the first two I have scouted
Oh, and I forgot to mention that I intend to turn this
into a segment of my Spontaneous Trips television show.
I guess I have no choice.
Since it is to protect the peace in Karakura Town.
You cannot just decide like that!
I refuse to let you be Red!
Bad spirits are after your sister!
Get ready for our first job!
I cannot understand what he is saying at all.
Sorry to keep you waiting, little girl.
Do not worry because we are here!
And the real Karakura Red, Jinta Harakari!
We will decide who Red will be based on your performance today!
EASILY ATTACHABLE SAW GRIPS WELL TOO
you can reach any Bad Spirit,
I shall entrust the Spirit Javelin to you!
You are the superstar that will linger in memory!
It is only natural,'cuz I am Red!
Showing up out of the blue!
You are not taking the Red title from me!
I keep telling you, you are not Red, either!
Only the one who gives a Number One performance
Are not you going to fight, Mr. Kanonji?
That kind of fighting will not make you Red!
Did you see the power of Red?!
Like I said, I am RED!
So you have finally appeared Bad Spirit King!
This is a job for the Karakura Superheroes!
But before that, let us plan strategy.
Our unified desire for justice called forth a miracle!
That is the Hero Robot sent to us by the gods!
Let us join the Lion Jet, too!
If I had not come by, Raku would not have had to die.
I thought maybe you would hold a grudge against me.
which was summoned from our power of justice, saved you.
I think it was able to pass over.
Then that cat was really a ghost?
Probably, it was able to come to terms with whatever regrets it had.
I-I was not able to do anything for Raku
He said, thank you, to you just now.
I am not sure, but a man senses these things.
You are not fit to be Red!
I looked up into the night sky and saw a comet
I want to see you right now, but I cannot fly
If I could become a comet
I would fly across the sky I am sure
I would circle the skies and shine over you
With this instantaneous light that will definitely reach you
If I could become a comet
I am sure I will always stay close to you
Oh, that was a nice story.
What about everyone is idol, Kon?!
No one cares about your existence.
I got new stuffing, and was waiting!
